description:
Detects a network connection initiated by Cmstp.EXE
Its uncommon for "cmstp.exe" to initiate an outbound network connection. Investigate the source of such requests to determine if they are malicious.
name: Outbound Network Connection Initiated By Cmstp.EXE
query: (process.executable:*\\cmstp.exe AND network.direction:true) AND (NOT (destination.ip:127.0.0.0\/8 OR destination.ip:10.0.0.0\/8 OR destination.ip:172.16.0.0\/12 OR destination.ip:192.168.0.0\/16 OR destination.ip:169.254.0.0\/16 OR destination.ip:\:\:1\/128 OR destination.ip:fe80\:\:\/10 OR destination.ip:fc00\:\:\/7))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
